ProductInfo.Features:
GW9216: 16 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H & D1 resolution; HDMI output for better resolution; New GUI; PTZ Control; Multiple operation modes; USB2.0 backup, upgrade and mouse operation;
GW623C: 1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft. IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes: 1xGW9316H DVR with 2T HD; 1xGWLED19IN: Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;  12 x GW623C: 1/3" CMOS CCD Camera; 1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable
Package Includes: 1x GW1218-10A: 18 ports power box; 12 x GW082: Male Power pigtail; 12 x GW132: Female Power pigtail; 24 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc. 12CHV2 Professional 16-Channel Real Time DVR 650 TVL 3.6mm Lens Outdoor Camera Security Camera System (Black)
